Description

Globally Unique IDentifier (GUID) & Universally Unique IDentifier (UUID)

Author

jNizm

Source

https://​autohotkey​.com​/boards​/viewtopic​.php​?t=4732

Categories

License

Functions
CreateGUID
CreateGUID()

Creates a GUID, a unique 128-bit integer used for CLSIDs and interface identifiers

Returns

generated GUID

Example
GUID_1 := CreateGUID()
IsEqualGUID
IsEqualGUID(
guid1,
guid2
)

Determines whether two GUIDs are equa

Parameters
guid1

First GUID to compare

guid2

Second GUID to compare

Returns

1 if equal, 0 if not equal

Example
GUID_1 := CreateGUID()
GUID_2 := CreateGUID()
MsgBox % IsEqualGUID(GUID_1, GUID_2)    ; ==> 0
MsgBox % IsEqualGUID(GUID_1, GUID_1)    ; ==> 1
CreateUUID
CreateUUID()

Creates a UUID

Returns

generated UUID

Example
UUID_1 := CreateUUID()
UuidEqual
UuidEqual(
uuid1,
uuid2
)

Determines whether two UUIDs are equal

Parameters
uuid1

First UUID to compare

uuid2

Second UUID to compare

Returns

1 if equal, 0 if not equal

Example
UUID_1 := CreateUUID()
UUID_2 := CreateUUID()
MsgBox % UuidEqual(UUID_1, UUID_2)    ; ==> 0
MsgBox % UuidEqual(UUID_1, UUID_1)    ; ==> 1
